title: Huawei steps up rivalry in European phone market
text:
Huawei steps up rivalry in European phone market Wednesday, March 28, 2018 - 01:06 
Chinese phonemaker Huawei, the world's number three, has stepped up its battle for European market-share. It's leading the charge with a new flagship phone - with a top-notch triple camera - that it hopes can help it take on rivals Samsung and Apple. Lucy Fielder reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
